Title: Vault of Terror II: The Undead
Director: Charlton Jacob Jacques, Gregory Kurczynski, Jerry Landi, John Renna, Sean Weathers
Writer: Julian Dickman (segment), Bill Freas (segment), Lynne Hansen (segment), Jerry Landi (segment), John McDermott (segment), Sean Weathers (segment)
Actors: Lloyd Kaufman, Erika Smith, Tina Krause, Rachael Robbins
Plot: Following the macabre footsteps of the first VAULT OF TERROR installment, this sequel anthology film tells six more evil, demonic, hellish tales of dread and horror by some of the genre's best filmmakers.
